quote: Frankly, my dear, I don't give a damn.
author: Rhett Butler

quote: I'm gonna make him an offer he can't refuse.
author: Vito Corleone

quote: You don't understand! I coulda had class. I coulda been a contender. I could've been somebody, instead of a bum, which is what I am.
author: Terry Malloy

quote: Toto, I've a feeling we're not in Kansas anymore.
author: Dorothy Gale

quote: All right, Mr. DeMille, I'm ready for my close-up.
author: Norma Desmond

quote: May the Force be with you.
author: Han Solo

quote: Fasten your seatbelts. It's going to be a bumpy night.
author: Margo Channing

quote: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
author: Albert Einstein
source: This quote, first appearing in Ego, Hunger, and Aggression: a Revision of Freudâ€™s Theory and Method by Frederick S. Perls. Einstein (1879 - 1955) is known to have clashed with popular thinking and the limited imagination of fellow scientists and the public

quote: It is strange that only extraordinary men make the discoveries, which later appear so easy and simple.
author: Georg C. Lichtenberg
source: Georg Lichtenberg (1742 - 1799) was a German experimental physicist known for satire. Science is built upon previous knowledge, which is incredible that what is now common sense mathematics was once never before discovered or thought of.

quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life
author: Charles Darwin
source: Charles Darwin (1809 - 1882) was a naturalist and geologist who pioneered the field of evolutionary biology. Want to accomplish as much as Darwin did in his lifetime, adhere to his advice and don't waste one single hour of your time.

quote: You cannot teach a man anything; you can only help him discover it in himself.
author: Galileo
source: Galileo Galilei (1564 - 1642) was an Italian astronomer, mathematician, physicist, and philosopher. Galileo's quote is one echoed for generations that one must learn something for themselves. Your mom may have told you the burner was hot as a kid but you eventually tested it for yourself.
